segments.text: Hey , Jenny . Would you like to go to dinner with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . You know what they say about office romances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't . What do they say about office romances ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They say you shouldn't mix love and work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's silly . What I do on my own time is no one else ’ s business . Besides , it's pretty hard to meet people outside of the office when we spend long hours here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ Ve got a point . Once I dated one of my supervisors and all of my co-workers accused him of favoritism . Then when the relationship went bad , he fired me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: People fall in love with people they work with . That's a fact .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That may be true , but I don't want an inter-office relationship to affect my productivity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it does , it will only make you more productive , because we can support each other .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are sounding like we are already married .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good grief . All I did was ask you out . I am sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't feel right about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am talking about dinner tonight , not a lifetime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most starts with dinner , but then it gets out of hand . Besides , haven't you asked out every woman in the entire office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Company ? I heard about you from Linda . She said you were an octopus !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What can I say ? I am a passionate guy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I hope you can find something else to be passionate about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You want to go out with me and you know it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In your dreams . Now if you don't mind , I've got some work to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I get the message . Hey , do you have any sisters ?
segments.speaker: S1
